rule.mobGriefingOverride.name: 生物破坏覆写
rule.mobGriefingOverride.desc: 当启用此选项游戏规则 mobgriefing 将失效.
职业为农夫的村民是否进行耕作.
rule.mobGriefingWitherCreateExplosion.de: 凋零生成后发生地爆炸是否破坏地形.
rule.mobGriefingWitherCanDestroy.name: 凋零方块破坏控制
rule.mobGriefingWitherCanDestroy.desc: 凋零受到伤害时是否破坏方块.
rule.mobGriefingWitherCanDestroy.extra.0: 仅当游戏规则 mobgriefing 为 true 时生效.
rule.mobGriefingEnderDragonDestroyBlocks: 末影龙是否破坏途径的方块.
rule.mobGriefingCreeperCreateExplosion.d: 苦力怕发生地爆炸是否破坏地形.
rule.mobGriefingEnderManPickUpBlock.name: 末影人拾取方块控制
rule.mobGriefingEnderManPickUpBlock.desc: 末影人是否能够拾取方块.
rule.mobGriefingEnderManPlaceBlock.name: 末影人放置方块控制
rule.mobGriefingEnderManPlaceBlock.desc: 末影人是否能够放置方块.
rule.mobGriefingEvokerWololo.name: 唤魔者的魔法
rule.mobGriefingEvokerWololo.desc: 唤魔者是否能改变周围羊毛的颜色.
rule.mobGriefingPiglinGather.name: 猪灵拾取
rule.mobGriefingPiglinGather.desc: 猪灵是否能够拾取物品.
rule.mobGriefingRavagerBreakBlocks.name: 劫掠兽破坏
rule.mobGriefingRavagerBreakBlocks.desc: 劫掠兽是否能够破坏方块.
rule.mobGriefingSilverfishInfectStones.d: 蠹虫是否能够感染石头类方块.
rule.mobGriefingSilverfishOutOfBlocks.de: 蠹虫是否能够从虫蛀方块中脱离.
rule.mobGriefingFoxEatSweetBerries.name: 狐狸摘浆果
rule.mobGriefingFoxEatSweetBerries.desc: 狐狸是否能够摘取甜浆果.
rule.mobGriefingRabbitEatCarrotCrop.name: 兔子吃胡萝卜
rule.mobGriefingRabbitEatCarrotCrop.desc: 兔子是否能够吃胡萝卜.
rule.mobGriefingSnowGolemSpawnSnow.name: 雪傀儡产雪
rule.mobGriefingSnowGolemSpawnSnow.desc: 雪傀儡是否能够在移动时产生雪片.
火球是否能够在穿越方块时产生爆炸.
rule.mobGriefingSmallFireballSpawnFire.d: 小火球是否能够在接触方块时时产生火焰.
rule.mobGriefingWitherSkullCreateExplosi: 凋零之首是否产生爆炸.
